memo_text:
* Bidder 1, starting with $20000, has won 3 items in this auction, with a total profit of $11100.:
  * Won Unit Q at $6000 over $5000, with a true value of $10000.
  * Won Machine P at $6000 over $5000, with a true value of $10000.
  * Won Appliance O at $4900 over $4000, with a true value of $8000.

* Bidder 2, starting with $20000, has won 2 items in this auction, with a total profit of $7000.:
  * Won Element R at $6000 over $5000, with a true value of $10000.
  * Won Utensil N at $5000 over $4000, with a true value of $8000.

* Bidder 3, starting with $20000, has won 1 items in this auction, with a total profit of $2800.:
  * Won Contraption I at $3200 over $3000, with a true value of $6000.

* Bidder 4, starting with $20000, has won 6 items in this auction, with a total profit of $4278.:
  * Won Doodad D at $2501 over $2000, with a true value of $4000.
  * Won Widget A at $2100 over $1000, with a true value of $2000.
  * Won Mechanism J at $8800 over $4000, with a true value of $8000.
  * Won Thingamajig C at $1501 over $1000, with a true value of $2000.
  * Won Gadget B at $1300 over $1000, with a true value of $2000.
  * Won Apparatus H at $3520 over $3000, with a true value of $6000.
